content: star knitting pattern @dunaksa 1/9 let s start in this tutorial you will find step by step instruction on how to knit a star toy thank you for buying this pattern it is suitable for beginning and intermediate knitting skills and assumes an understanding of basic stitches and standard knitting terms you will also need skills for knitting in the round on four knitting needles for your convenience the pattern contains many photos of the process i hope you will enjoy using it @dunaksa 2/9 abbreviations k = knit s2kp = slip 2 stitches together knitwise knit 1 pass slipped stitches over knit stitch and off right needle st = stitches round = round materials  wool yarn in color you like  6 knitting needles you will also need  yarn needle  scissors  toy filling to stuff the star for the star i used wool yarn in weight 50 g 1 8 oz / 167 m 183 yards and needles in a size 2 75 mm 2 us or 12 uk the finishing toy is 8 cm in diameter you can take another yarn and knitting needles in a size suitable for the yarn weight and get another size of your star @dunaksa 3/9 the pattern instruction cast on 105 stitches fig 1 distribute stitches among 5 knitting needles 21 stitches on each needle and begin to work in the round round 1 k all 21 sts on each needle total 105 sts round 2 k9 s2kp k9 repeat on each needle 19 sts on each needle total 95 sts round 3 k8 s2kp k8 repeat on each needle 17 sts on each needle total 85 sts round 4 k7 s2kp k7 repeat on each needle 15 sts on each needle total 75 sts @dunaksa 4/9 fig 2 round 5 k6 s2kp k6 repeat on each needle 13 sts on each needle total 65 sts round 6 k5 s2kp k5 repeat on each needle 11 sts on each needle total 55 sts round 7 k4 s2kp k4 repeat on each needle 9 sts on each needle total 45 sts round 8 k3 s2kp k3 repeat on each needle 7 sts on each needle total 35 sts round 9 k2 s2kp k2 repeat on each needle 5 sts on each needle total 25 sts round 10 k1 s2kp k1 repeat on each needle 3 sts on each needle total 15 sts round 11 s2kp repeat on each needle 1 sts on each needle total 5 sts @dunaksa 5/9 fig 3 cut the yarn and gather 5 remaining stitches together pull tight hide the end of yarn and fixate it on the wrong side of the star fig 4 pick up and knit 105 stitches along a slipped-stitch edge 21 stitches on each needle to make the knitting look neat use a thinner needles for this next knit on usual knitting needles repeat from round 1 to round 11 @dunaksa 6/9 fig 5 put the stuffing into the star
